setDates.!comment3: Integer (milliseconds): Time the warning is shown before the listed date. Default: 12 Hours

!comment4: Array of patterns to repeat warnings.

repeatPatterns.!comment6: List [hour, minute, second]: Time of day. Default: 3:00:00 AM
repeatPatterns.!comment7: Integer/String (0-7, *): Day of week. Default: Sunday
repeatPatterns.!comment8: Integer/String (0-7, *): Day of month. Default: Any/Ignored
repeatPatterns.!comment10: Integer (milliseconds): Time the warning is shown before the listed date. Default: 12 Hours
